alert.note: Alert for Benson; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:55AM CDT until June 20 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL BENSON...SOUTHEASTERN TOWNER AND NORTHWESTERN RAMSEY COUNTIES... At 354 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Churchs Ferry, or 18 miles northwest of Devils Lake, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Garske and Starkweather. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
